title: 214. How to Create Suspense
description: Why is soccer the best sport? How has Harlan Coben sold 70 million books? And why does "Apollo 13" keep you enthralled even when you know the ending?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
